definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The particle- antiparticle concept is one of the most fascinating ones in physics.
sentences.chinese: 粒子和反粒子是物理學中最迷惑人的概念之一。

sentences.english: Fewer than zero particles being present usually means that you have antiparticles instead.
sentences.chinese: 出現比0要少的粒子通常說明了你有了反粒子。

sentences.english: Charge reversal is the replacement of all particles with antiparticles.
sentences.chinese: 電荷反轉是將所有的粒子換成其反粒子。

sentences.english: In the same way the proton and neutron should also have their corresponding antiparticles.
sentences.chinese: 同樣地，質子和中子也應該有對應的反粒子。

sentences.english: A horizontal bar over a particle symbol is used to designate the antiparticle.
sentences.chinese: 粒子符號上加一橫，用來表示反粒子。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]

pinyin: Xi1 ge2 si1 bo1 se4 zi3
